rooms.description: A welcoming space with Vastu-aligned entrance facing east, ensuring positive energy flow.
Spacious living area open to the central courtyard for natural light and ventilation. Designed with modern aesthetics and luxury finishes.
Adjacent to the living room, featuring a Vastu-compliant layout promoting social interaction and balanced energy distribution.
Functional kitchen with modern appliances, located in a north-east direction for enhanced culinary energy as per Vastu guidelines.
Comfortable guest room with adequate light and ventilation. Designed to ensure privacy while maintaining an open feel towards the courtyard.
Connected to the living area, equipped with modern fixtures, ensuring proper drainage in accordance with local building norms.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned to east, adhering to Vastu principles.
Large window overlooking the central courtyard for maximum natural light and ventilation.
Connection between kitchen and dining area ensuring functional flow.

courtyard.description: Central open space that provides natural light, ventilation, and a sense of spaciousness. The courtyard is designed to be the heart of the apartment.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an attached ensuite bathroom. Positioned in a north-west area for relaxation and positive energy.
Comfortable bedroom ensuring privacy and ample ventilation; Vastu principles suggest positioning to avoid direct alignment with the entrance.
Additional bedroom maintaining a balanced layout, aligned in accordance with local norms and Vastu guidelines.
Modern bathroom adjacent to Bedroom 2, ensuring privacy and compliance with local plumbing standards.

openings.description: Large window offering a scenic view of the central courtyard, enhancing natural light and ventilation.
Secure door ensuring privacy for the additional bedroom.

balcony.description: Balcony attached to the master bedroom for outdoor relaxation and enhanced air circulation.

rooms.description: Multi-purpose room serving as an additional bedroom or home office. Designed to be flexible for modern needs.
Dedicated study area with ample natural light and a quiet environment, ensuring productivity and compliance with Vastu energy flow principles.

openings.description: Large window providing views of the courtyard and ensuring a well-lit space.
